turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make an order at Starbucks on Rainbow and Westcliff.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. what do you want to order from starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One caramel macchiato, one caramel brulée latte seasonal offering.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hm, it looks like Caramel Brulée Latte is no longer being offered this month.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want another drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, a cappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what sizes did you want your drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Tall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and with what milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want them hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: iced.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thanks for answering. so i'll order 1 tall iced caramel macchiato and 1 tall iced cappuccino from starbucks on rainbow and westcliff.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did i get that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $13.40 is your total. should i process the payment now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Nice, the drink has been ordered. and it should be ready for pick up in 9 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hope you have a better day.
